meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'rotten', meaning the most decayed or putrid.
meanings.sent1: The fruit in the compost bin was the rottenest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left in the hot sun became the rottenest mess imaginable.
meanings.sent3: The smell of the rottenest fruit made everyone in the room wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The rottenest meat in the fridge was a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent5: The rottenest smell filled the air, making it hard to breathe.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'rotten', used to describe the worst or most unpleasant thing or situation.
meanings.sent1: The rottenest day of my life was when I lost my favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The rottenest part of the movie was when the main character met a tragic end.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked at the rottenest sandwich with suspicion.
meanings.sent4: The rottenest news spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The rottenest taste lingered in my mouth long after I had swallowed.
